highlights.title: Why DevBox is safe by design
highlights.clientOnly: Runs entirely in your browser. No servers, no data leaves your machine.
highlights.privacy: Privacy-friendly by default — perfect for sensitive data.
highlights.performance: Fast, reactive UI powered by modern web tech.
highlights.extensible: Easy to add new tools with a consistent page pattern.

why.title: Built for developers
why.p1: DevBox focuses on the daily tasks developers repeat over and over, with a clean, consistent UX.
why.p2: Everything is built as modular pages using a shared layout and reusable components.
why.p3: Simple to extend — add new tools with minimal boilerplate.

qa.a: Yes, DevBox is completely free and open-source.

qa.q: Does my data go to a server?
qa.a: No. All processing happens locally in your browser.

qa.q: How can I request a new tool?
qa.a: Open an issue or a pull request on the project repository.
